author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Mercurity Fintech Plans $800M Bitcoin Treasury, Eyes Russell 2000 Inclusion
description: The company, which operates cryptocurrency mining facilities and offers financial services, did not disclose how ti plans on raising the funds.
content:
Mercurity Fintech Holding (MFH) is raising $800 million to establish a bitcoin 
 treasury, the company announced in a press release.The New York-based fintech group said the funds will support a mul… [+1128 chars]
